title: Remake vote needs to start at 1:30, if your ally isn't there when minions meet the game isn't fair
body: If you aren't even connected to the match when the game officially starts at 1:30 when the jungle creeps spawn and the minions are fighting each other then there is NO god damn reason why the team you're screwing over shouldn't be allowed to call a remake.

As someone who mains something "off meta", I get pretty sick of people telling me what I will and will not be able to do real fast. I'm sorry but you have no idea what some random is capable of. Will that disadvantage fuck some people? Yeah. But not all of them. And it isn't totally dependent on a champion pick either. That shouldn't be your call to make. 

100% of my late-to-game situations have been client bugs, freezes, and crashes. Even at the current remake time, I've still had a game or two I got scammed out of because of a bad load. And you know what? We might have been able to win that game. Team apologized right after because they voted yes exactly as I connected and, being competant, decent rank players, they knew we could have won. 

Now I'm not saying "get rid of remake". I'm sure it's saved me more than the 35 LP I've lost from late connections. However, if that window was pushed two minutes forward, I'm positive I'd be looking at a hundred LP or more down the drain. 

For God's sake, Rengar walking into your jungler's red side, fighting him for a minute, and dying without getting anything to the enemy top laner probably sets your jungler back harder than your mid laner missing a wave.

And certainly more than a mid Veigar with teleport that you'd be remaking on anyway.
